definition: starting point or ending point (in stories etc)/end point (math)
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The "mex" endpoint allows other applications to discover the capabilities of the service.
sentences.chinese: 在“墨西哥”端点允许其他应用程序发现服务的能力。

sentences.english: The number of gateways and endpoints has little effect.
sentences.chinese: 网关和端点的数量几乎没有任何影响。

sentences.english: Recoverable errors -- The request must be submitted to another endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 请求必须提交给另一个端点。

sentences.english: An implementation can improve this situation through externalizing the endpoint addresses into configuration files .NET.
sentences.chinese: 将端点地址放到配置文件中可以改善这种情况。

sentences.english: For our tutorial, we only have one endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 对于本教程，我们仅有一个端点。

sentences.english: You might also choose to externalize the routing using an endpoint lookup primitive.
sentences.chinese: 您还可能通过一个端点查找原语来具体化路由。

sentences.english: This endpoint is appended to the binding handle of the given interface and returned to the caller.
sentences.chinese: 把这个端点附加到接口的绑定句柄中并返回给调用者。

sentences.english: Administrators can change endpoint addresses in the administration console.
sentences.chinese: 管理员可以在管理控制台更改端点地址。

sentences.english: Endpoints can be added to groups or removed from them.
sentences.chinese: 端点能够添加到组，或从组中删除端点。

sentences.english: Endpoints can be added to groups or removed from them.
sentences.chinese: 端点能够添加到组，或从组中删除端点。

sentences.english: You are then using the endpoints as defined in the remote configuration file.
sentences.chinese: 那时，您使用的是远程配置文件中定义的端点。

sentences.english: You have finished reconfiguring the database endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 您已经完成了对数据库端点的重新配置。

sentences.english: Now you need to assign an endpoint for each referenced partner service.
sentences.chinese: 现在需要为每个引用的合作伙伴服务分配端点。

sentences.english: You can observe the status of the endpoints.
sentences.chinese: 您可以观察到端点的状态。

sentences.english: In the second section of Chapter Two, we give a characterization of non-extreme points of numerical range.
sentences.chinese: 本文在第二章第二节研究了数值域非端点的特征。

definition: modulus (distance from the origin in polar coordinates)
